title: Zodiac Diana
body:
hi! so continuing with a skinline of the zodiac signs here is Diana representing Cancer...it was a lot of preasure, because is my sign hahaha it represents water, the moon and also I love Diana, so a lot of favorites things in there, so many drawings came along! Yeah I know...I missed the Cancer Yasuo, Riven, Teemo jokes XD also Crabgot is already a thing.

I picked Diana to represent cancer because I really like her misfit aspect and her search for a place where she feels at home, and she found it by searching on the history books aka the past. Hope you guys/gals enjoy the concept ty <3

https://imgur.com/J075cyz

the other signs I've made:
Aries - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/i2EB0gLl-zodiac-patheon
Taurus - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/JIbr36RV-gemini-leblanc
Gemini - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/OhqTZrLE-taurus-taliyah

replies.body: I was under the impression that Yasuo was the representation of Cancer.

i really can't stand the queen of pain sort of look.. 
sorry not my cup
Now i can die with peace,it's perfect!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

> [{quoted}](name=Ninja Anubis,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aMs9uQog,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-19T22:15:21.718+0000)
>
> need a leo one!!!!

Leona needs a Leo Zodiac skin.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
This looks awesome. She looks badass.
